Tooltips: How high off the ground the item box will be. Usually item boxes are grounded with this field set to 135.
Whether the item box is single or double.

A special item will be always given if the item box is single, and only if the player's current position can have special items. Enabling Frantic mode, and setting the item box type to always single will ensure that a special item is always given.

ðŸ§© Requires the **Type-specific Item Boxes** code patch.

If this property is set, the item box will always give the same type of items.

---
<small>**IMPORTANT:** Custom tracks that utilize this property must include `type-specific-item-boxes` in the **code_patches** field in the `trackinfo.ini` file of the custom track.</small>
